channel.title: Canvas recently changed. Screen is cutoff
channel.description: As of a recent RS update, you now have to watch an in-game advertisement before proceeding to the lobby screen. For some reason in my bot, it shifts the applet down and the last 1/4 of the screen is cut off from view. Setting the applet's bounds doesen't fix the problem either. Can this be fixed by changing the applet loader parameters, or what? Is anybody else experiencing this issue?

item.title: Canvas recently changed. Screen is cutoff
item.dc:creator: @Fsig Fsig
item.description:
@Fsig wrote:

The canvas size has changed.

Old dimensions: 765, 503
New dimensions: 765, 553

You will need to change the size of your applet and all containers accordingly.

Read full topic
item.source: Canvas recently changed. Screen is cutoff

item.title: Canvas recently changed. Screen is cutoff

item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

can you post your code? if not a picture of the error with a pseudo code example of what you are doing

Read full topic
